title: Steel Division Normandy 44
notes: Windowed is good, but not full screen. If full screen it freeze. With some tweakings, the game is playable and good looking. Sound is good.Video settings lowered : No Vert sync, Texture Anisotropy Off, Shadow anti-aliasing Off, Tesselation Off, No Smooth LOD tr, No Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion Off, Global Illumination Off, Local Reflections Off. Other settings medium to high.

title: Steel Division Normandy 44
notes: Game freezing all the time even in windowed mode
I had to put the option Tesselation to off otherwise I was getting graphical glitches. The performance is inferior to Windows but it is running fine.
title: Steel Division: Normandy 44

notes: Sometimes requires a force-close to get past splash. Reducing graphical settings helps.
title: Steel Division: Normandy 44

notes: Video options preset set to High, works great at full screen 1920x1080. Skirmish was tested. When driver was 396.24 I couln'd run it full screen, nor with Tesselation, now I can!
title: Steel Division: Normandy 44

notes: Already successfully tested on Pop!_OS 18.04, I confirm now that it's running smooth, full screen, high video settings, on Ubuntu 18.10 with Proton 3.7-8, NVIDIA 410.73, kernel 4.18.0-10. No tweak.
title: Steel Division: Normandy 44
